verses.text: Great \add is\add* the \sc Lord\sc*, and greatly to be praised In the city of our God, \add in\add* the mountain of his holiness.
Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, \add is\add* mount Zion, \add On\add* the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
For lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
They saw \add it, and\add* so they marvelled; They were troubled, \add and\add* hasted away.
Fear took hold upon them there, \add And\add* pain, as of a woman in travail.
Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
As we have heard, so have we seen In the city of the \sc Lord\sc* of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, In the midst of thy temple.
According to thy name, O God, so \add is\add* thy praise unto the ends of the earth: Thy right hand is full \add of\add* righteousness.
Let mount Zion rejoice, Let the daughters of Judah be glad, Because of thy judgments.
Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; That ye may tell \add it\add* to the generation following.
For this God \add is\add* our God for ever and ever: He will be our guide \add even\add* unto death.
